00025 #ifndef _BASE_DIRECTORY_
00026 #define _BASE_DIRECTORY_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/VDirectory>
00030 
00031 #include <base/path_not_found>
00032 #include <base/io_error>
00033 
00034 #include <set>
00035 #include <string>
00036 #include <dirent.h>
00037 
00038 
00039 namespace base {
00040 
00041 class File;
00042 
00043 
00044 class Directory : public VDirectory
00045 {
00046 public:
00047   virtual ~Directory();
00048 
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("Directory"); }
00050   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewNamedObj(className()) Directory(*this); }
00051 
00052   virtual void operator=(const Directory& d);
00053   
00054   virtual bool contains(ref<const VEntry> name) const;
00055   virtual bool contains(const PathName& name) const;
00056 
00057   virtual ref<VFile>      file(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found); ///< construct a new VFile object 
00058   virtual ref<VDirectory> directory(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found); ///< construct a new VDirectory object
00059 
00060   virtual ref<VFile>      createFile(const PathName& name) const throw(io_error); ///< create a new file in this directory
00061   virtual void            deleteFile(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found, io_error); ///< delete a file in this directory
00062   virtual ref<VDirectory> createDirectory(const PathName& name) const throw(io_error); ///< create a new directory in this directory
00063   virtual void            deleteDirectory(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found, io_error); ///< delete a directory in this directory
00064 
00065 protected:
00066   void load() const;  // fills entries if not already loaded
00067   ref<VEntry> find(const String& name) const;
00068 
00069   virtual ref<VEntry> entry(Int i) const;
00070   virtual Int size() const;
00071 
00072   mutable bool loaded;
00073   typedef array<ref<VEntry> > VEntries;
00074   mutable VEntries entries;
00075   ref<const Directory> parent;
00076 
00077   Directory(ref<const Directory> parent);
00078   Directory(const Directory& d);
00079   Directory(const PathName& pathname, ref<const Directory> parent);
00080 
00081   friend class StdFileSystem;
00082 };
00083 
00084 } // base

00086 #endif
